column1: While it is nice to have your own clothes with you, labor and the first few days postpartum are usually a very messy time, so you may not want to wear your brand-new lingerie.

- Stopwatch or watch with a second hand for timing contractions - Phone list of contacts to announce your baby's birth to friends and family, including a cell phone, phone card, calling card, or change for calls - Snacks and drinks for the coach, and, if allowed by the hospital, for you - Massage rollers, massage oils to relieve back pain from labor - The object you have chosen to use to focus your attention during labor (the "focal point")
